remarks: The norm of a vector is a member of the scalar field in a complex pre-Hilbert space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmsq.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
nmsq.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
nmsq.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
cphnmcl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cphnmcl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphnmcl $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. V ) -> ( N ` A ) e. K ) $.
